title: How to play music through a USB in a car with a Samsung Galaxy - Quora

response.answer_text: Usb in your car stereo is intended for usb sticks with audio files on them, I don't actually think it can support your phone, the only way I could think it would is if the phone was set to mtp mode but even then I really don't think it's possible because of all the other data on your phone, if your stereo has a line in or bluetooth you are better off doing that
